data.name: RPG Maker MV - Minikle's Background CG Material Collection Abandoned School  Horror part01 A
data.detailed_description:
RPG Maker official material collection is now available.

This is a picture material of old Japanese school buildings.
Time difference and horror scene difference materials are also included.
Please use these materials for horror game development.

You can expand the world design with the Minikle's Background CG Material Collection Abandoned School Horror part01 B"

*******************************************
Including pictures：66 material x 2 sizes（816 pixels×624 pixels、1280 pixels x 720 pixels）
*******************************************
